Models.name: Stacker Cover
Models.description: One per stacker

Models.name: Multi currency package 2-5 currencies
Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations.

Models.name: Multi currency package 6-10 currencies
Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed package for 2-5 currencies.

Models.name: Multi currency package 11-30 currencies
Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed packages for 2-5 and 6-10 currencies.

Models.name: Multi currency package > 30 currencies, price on request
Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Only applies to available and released adaptations. Up to 60 currencies are possible, depending on the complexity of the adaptations.

Models.name: Mixed currency processing
Models.description: Processing of up to 10 currencies simultaneously if they are already installed in a multi-currency package. Please note: Every combination needs to be tested upfront.

Models.name: Serial number reading
Models.description: Reads the serial number (SN) of banknotes incl. the possibility to either store it on the system or send the data as well as the image of the SN to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine.

Models.name: Serial number reading, comparison and consolidation (SNR, data export)
Models.description: Reads both serial number (SN) of banknotes (OCR) and compares them. If they are different, i.e. a suspected composed note the banknote will be sent to reject. If both SNs are equal the banknote will be stacked, and data sent to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine.

Models.name: Special commercial security features
Models.description: Some banknotes contain special features such as SICPATalk or have been inked by IBNS solutions. Many of such features can be detected, however require additional adaptation effort per currency. This price is only valid for adaptations which have implemented the respective feature.

Models.name: Ticket reading
Models.description: Software function to read casino tickets by the sensor system and send data to a defined IP-address. 4 orientations. Mixed processing of tickets and banknotes. Please note: BPS Connect Casino for prepping and reconciliation as well as a PC are not included in this price.

Models.name: Fast Deposit Processing (FDP), free of charge
Models.description: Software function to increase efficiency by 1-step process: The deposit data are entered via barcode reader directly at the system, banknotes are verified and sorted in one run, rejects are processed offline to finally balance the deposit. Please note that a barcode reader is not included in the price and needs to be ordered separately. A license for cash management system is also not included in the price for the FDP option.

Models.name: Video surveillance interface and SNTP, free of charge
Models.description: XML report to connect the processing data of a particular deposit with the video stream of the surveillance supplier.

Models.name: BPS Config Optimizer, free of charge
Models.description: External application for customer PC (Windows) to change operation modes and machine configuration (e.g. reports, stacker capacity).

Models.name: BPS C5-5
Models.description: Input module with 5 output stackers

Models.name: BPS C5-9
Models.description: Input module with 9 output stackers (5 + 4)

Models.name: BPS C5-13
Models.description: Input module with 13 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4)

Models.name: BPS C5-17, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 17 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-21, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 21 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-25, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 25 output stackers (5 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4), price on request

Models.name: BPS C5-1B, price on request
Models.description: Input module with 1 Bander Delivery Module (BDM), price on request

Models.name: Standard Delivery Module (SDM)
Models.description: Upgrade of an existing system with an additional SDM (max. 6 modules can be connected to a system in total). One SDM contains 4 stackers for loose banknotes.

Models.name: Bander Delivery Module (BDM)
Models.description: With the BDM, the functionality of online banding can be added to the BPS C5; one BDM is designated to one denomination (2 stackers working in tandem). A BPS C5 can be equipped with up to 6 modules in total (any combination from SDM and BDM).

Models.name: Upgrade Spares for BDM - Image sensor PIS 7S and Panel element INL ASSY, see price in Spare Parts Catalogue

Models.name: Upgrade Spares for BDM - Panel element INL ASSY
Models.description: Required parts for BPS C5 hardware releases = R3.7 and 110V with more than 2 BDMs, see price in Spare Parts Catalogue

Models.name: GUI mounting kit
Models.description: The mounting kit allows to attach the GUI to the BPS C5 enclosure (from R3.10 onwards)

Models.description: GUI table stand with flexible angle adjustment (only for high resolution GUI)

Models.name: Traffic light

Models.name: Bander output slider
Models.description: Bander output slider will slide the banded packets from bander output

Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Applies only to available and released adaptations. This multi currency package requires the installed packages for 2-5 and 6-10 currencies

Models.description: Processing of installed currencies in sequence. Only applies to available and released adaptations. Up to 60 currencies are possible, depending on the complexity of the adaptations, price on request

Models.name: Mixed currency processing
Models.description: Processing of up to 10 currencies simultaneously if they are already installed in a multi-currency package. Please note: Every combination needs to be tested upfront

Models.name: Serial number reading
Models.description: Reads the serial number (SN) of banknotes incl. the possibility to either store it on the system or send the data as well as the image of the SN to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine.

Models.name: Serial number reading, comparison and consolidation (SNR, data export)
Models.description: Reads both serial number (SN) of banknotes (OCR) and compares them. If they are different, i.e. a suspected composed note the banknote will be sent to reject. If both SNs are equal the banknote will be stacked, and data sent to a defined IP address or a connected USB stick. The system can also look for a specific SN in a search list which is stored on the machine.

Models.name: Special commercial security features
Models.description: Some banknotes contain special features such as SICPATalk or have been inked by IBNS solutions. Many of such features can be detected, however require additional adaptation effort per currency. This price is only valid for adaptations which have implemented the respective feature

Models.name: Ticket reading
Models.description: Software function to read casino tickets by the sensor system and send data to a defined IP-address. 4 orientations. Mixed processing of tickets and banknotes. Please note: BPS Connect Casino for prepping and reconciliation as well as a PC are not included in this price

Models.name: Fast Deposit Processing (FDP)
Models.description: Software function to increase efficiency by 1-step process: The deposit data are entered via barcode-reader directly at the system, banknotes verified and sorted in one run, rejects are processed offline to finally balance the deposit. Free of charge

Models.name: Headercard Deposit processing (HDP)
Models.description: Software function for increasing productivity by a 1-step process: Header cards and subsequent banknotes are recognized by the BPS C5 sensor; processing data are sent to a vault management SW such as Compass VMS on an external PC. The reject reconciliation is done offline to process continuously and thus maximize throughput at BPS C5.

Models.name: Dynamic sorting
Models.description: Banknotes are sorted dynamically into an available delivery stacker without singler stop: When a stacker is emptied, the sorting criteria for this stacker are reset, and this stacker is immediately available for any subsequent banknote with different sorting criteria. It is also possible to mix dynamic and fix stacker assignments.

Models.name: Video surveillance interface and SNTP, free of charge
Models.description: XML report to connect the processing data of a particular deposit with the video stream of the surveillance supplier. Free of charge

Models.name: BPS Config Optimizer, free of charge
Models.description: External application for customer PC (Windows) to change operation modes and machine configuration (e.g. reports, stacker capacity). Free of charge

Models.name: Activation file creation
Models.description: In case an activation file creation is required not in combination with a hardware or software order, this service fee will be charged

Models.description: BPS C6 with 4 output stackers, including one pre-defined currency adaptation
